name: Train Fog NYC
description:
Move with wasd and spacebar. Press p or escape to pause.

Walk through fog to remove it. Try to remove all the fog.

Trains will fling you up in the air.

Assets Used:

NYC Models from Geopipe (geopipe.ai)

Fog texture from https://github.com/etredal/FogTutorial

Train model from https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/vehicles/land/industrial-train-dr14-162...

First Person Controller code from youtube tutorials by Brackeys
